subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The death last week of Lorenzo Charles, who grew up in the relatively benign surroundings of Starrett City, cast a light on the area’s failure to produce many athletes of note.
snippet: The death last week of Lorenzo Charles, who grew up in the relatively benign surroundings of Starrett City, cast a light on the area’s failure to produce many athletes of note.
